dependance.lib.Avertissement Développeur: L'incrément d: Developer Warning: The percentage increment per step
dependance.lib.est inférieur à 2%. Augmentez le range o: is less than 2%. Increase the range or reduce the number of steps

dependance.lib.fois, mais numSubStepMax est défini à: times, but you've defined numSubStepMax to
dependance.lib.Erreur sur une source principale de la d: Error on a main source of the distribution, cannot fix
dependance.lib.Ouf ! apt-get update a bien fonctionné a: Phew ! apt-get update did worked fine after
dependance.lib.Cette étape s'est bien déroulée ici, mai: This step went fine in the end, but be aware that other plugins may have the same issue with that source !

in error, launching countermeasures, wait 45sec and relaunch dependencies to retry

install_nodejs.sh.ATTENTION Debian 8 Jessie n'est officiel: WARNING Debian 8 Jessie is not supported anymore since the 30rd of june 2020, thank you to update your system in a new Debian version !!!
install_nodejs.sh.ATTENTION Debian 9 Stretch n'est officie: WARNING Debian 9 Stretch is not supported anymore since the 30rd of june 2022, thank you to update your system in a new Debian version !!!
install_nodejs.sh.ATTENTION Debian 10 Buster n'est officie: WARNING Debian 10 Buster is not supported anymore since June 30, 2024. Please update your system in a new Debian version!!!
install_nodejs.sh.Les dépendances sont bloquées afin d'évi: Dependencies are blocked to avoid any issues. Either
install_nodejs.sh.fonctionne et donc on y touche plus tant: works and so we don't touch the dependencies as long as it works, or it doesn't work anymore and you have to update your system in a new Debian version.
install_nodejs.sh.ATTENTION Debian 10 Buster n'est officie: WARNING Debian 10 Buster is not supported anymore since June 30, 2024. Nevertheless, the Debian 11 image for the Smart box is still under development by Jeedom.
install_nodejs.sh.Les dépendances vont quand même se lance: Dependancies will continue (but no support will be done if it fails). Watch for Jeedom news to update to Debian 11 as soon as they release the new image.
install_nodejs.sh.Vous avez refusé le support, Vous utilis: You have denied any support, Dependencies install will start, but it's possible it doesn't work...
install_nodejs.sh.Jeedom 4.4.17 est passé à NodeJS 20 qui: Jeedom 4.4.17 upgrade NodeJS 18 to NodeJS 20, that's incompatible with Debian 10. NO SUPPORT WILL BE DONE ANYMORE !!! Please migrate ASAP !
install_nodejs.sh.ATTENTION Votre système est x86 en 32bit: WARNING Your system is x86 in 32bits and NodeJS does not support it anymore, thank you to reinstall in 64bits !!!
install_nodejs.sh.Jeedom Mini ou Raspberry 1, 2 ou zéro dé: Jeedom Mini or Raspberry 1, 2 or zero detected, unsupported but we try to install unofficial packet
